annotations.description: This drink is nothing short of Awesome. Created by my good friend Chris Day who you can find running the bar at Kon Tiki in Oakland, CA. Chris knew something...
annotations.title: Yes, Pineapples Make Great Negronis

textContent:
1.5oz (45ml) Pineapple Rum
.75oz (22.5ml) Campari
.75oz (22.5ml) Sweet Vermouth
2 Dashes Chocolate Bitters
Lime Peel Garnish

Stir in glass over ice or strain into coupe

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xc3cnMtkxsk
title: Best Fronds
